message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your effort. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $750,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $750,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider coming down to $900,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but considering my financial situation, I am unable to go beyond $825,000 for the product. I hope we can find common ground.
